trends: There have been no other sightings in Goupillières
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: The first sighting was very bright
divs: sighting detailsi have a lot pictures of it who state more than i can express myself. please, look at them and analyse them in order to see by yourself. i've put the photos by night on my site. some don't have anything, but the else is quite shocking. from the ground, you couldn't notice those shape. planes were flying under it, so it was high in the sky. i also have the bright star in sighting since may of this year, and it move quite a bit, oftenly near midnight, somedays 23h00. my site where you can download all the photos http:\\tubedecolle.free.fr\ i made a animation of the first night http:\\tubedecolle.free.fr\night01\film01.html i hope you'll find them interresting and that the photos could help. best regards ps: yesterday night was cloudy, so i couldn't see them. i hope tonight will be clear, a friend lend me a camcorder, with tripod, may be i'll catch something on video. i see them everynight since the 25 september of 2009. what should i do ?
